_first_name_must_be_string: First name must be a string
_middle_name_must_be_string: Middle name must be a string
_last_name_must_be_string: Last name must be a string
_email_must_be_valid_email_address: Email must be a valid email address.
_pan_card_number_must_string: PAN card number must be a string
_aadhar_card_number_must_be_12_digit_num: Aadhaar card number must be a 12-digit number
_usertype_must_be_buyer: User type must be a BUYER
_password_must_be_at_least_8_character: Password must be at least 8 characters long
_contain_at_least_one_upparcase_lowercas: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
_confirm_password_must_be_string: Confirm password must be a string
_password_and_confirm_password_not_match: Password and confirm password does not match
